item.title: Music system - PI
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

i created an un-finished music base for Project-Exile, but were not using so here you guys are:

WorldManager.java

[code]package server.model.players.content.music;

import java.util.HashMap;

/**
*

  • @author Rhubarb/Int Bauk

*/
public class WorldManager {

/**
 * Our enum.
 *
 *
 */
public enum LocationHandler {
	TUTORIAL(1, 2625, 2687, 4670, 4735),
	YANILLE(48, 2532, 2621, 3071, 3122);
	
	int songId; int locationX; int locationX1;
	int locationY; int locationY1;
	
	/**
	 * Our constructor for the enum LocationHandler.
	 * @param songId
	 * @param locationX
	 * @param locationX1
	 * @param locationY
	 * @param locationY1
	 */
	LocationHandler(int songId, int locationX, int locationX1, 
			int locationY, int locationY1) {
		this.songId = songId;
		this.locationX = locationX;
		this.locationX1 = locationX1;
		this.locationY = locationY;
		this.locationY1 = locationY1;		
	}
	
	/**
	 * Creates a new hash map for the enum LocationHandler.
	 */
	public static HashMap<Integer, LocationHandler> location = 
			new HashMap<Integer, LocationHandler>();

	/**
	 * Used for inheriting the song id.
	 * @param songId
	 * @return songId
	 */
	public static LocationHandler forSongId(int songId) {
		return location.get(songId);
	}
	
	/**
	 * Gets the song id.
	 * @return songId.
	 */
	public int getSongId() {
		return songId;
	}
}

}

[/code]

MusicHandler.java:

[code]package server.model.players.content.music;

import server.model.players.Player;
import server.model.players.content.music.WorldManager.LocationHandler;

/**
*

  • @author Rhubarb/Int Bauk

*/
public class MusicHandler {

/**
 * Player constructor.
 */
private Player player;

/**
 * Create a new instance for the class MusicData musicData.
 */
MusicData musicData = new MusicData();

/**
 * Create a new instance for the class WorldManager worldManager.
 */
WorldManager worldManager = new WorldManager();


/**
 * Constructor for player class.
 * @param player
 */
public MusicHandler(Player player) {
	this.player = player;
}

/**
 * Declare the current song and current area id.
 */
private int currentArea, currentSong = 0;

/**
 * Gets the songId(currentArea);
 */
final WorldManager.LocationHandler location = LocationHandler.forSongId(currentArea);

/**
 * Sets a song.
 */
private void setSong() {
	currentSong = musicData.getSong(currentArea);
}

/**
 * Updates song.
 */
private void updateSong() {
	setSong();
}

/**
 * Set the area(s) identification.
 */
private void setSongArea() {
	location.getSongId();
}

/**
 * Updates the song via location.
 */
private void updateAreaSong() {
	setSongArea();
}

/**
 * Handles the music sent to the client.
 */
public void handleMusic() {
	updateSong();
	updateAreaSong();
	/**
	 * player.sendSong(currentSong);
	 */
}

}
[/code]

MusicData.java:

[code]package server.model.players.content.music;

/**
*

  • @author Rhubarb/Int Bauk

*/
public class MusicData {

/**
 * Gets the song identification.
 * @param location
 * @return
 */
public int getSong(int location) {
	switch(location) {
	case 1:
		return 62;
	case 2:
		return 318;
	case 3:
		return 381;
	case 4:
		return 380;
	default:
		return 3;
	}
	
}

}
[/code]

key points: you’ll need music client sided & some methods server sided.

config: // 1 = Tut // 2 = CW SPawn Room // 3 = Barrows under // 4 = Barrows top // 5 = Wildy // 6 = Ardy // 7 = Edgy // 8 = Wiz Tower // 9 = PC // 10 = Al Kharid // 11 = Lumbridge // 12 = Falador // 13 = Fight Caves // 14 = Pirate House // 15 = Barbarian Village // 16 = The Abyss // 17 = Ape Atoll // 18 = Bandit Camp // 19 = Barbarian Agility // 20 = Bedabin Camp // 21 = Crash Island // 22 = Catherby // 23 = White Wolf Moutain // 24 = Burthrope // 25 = Camelot // 26 = Canfis // 27 = Random Event Maze // 28 = Crandor // 29 = Draynor // 30 = Duel Arena // 31 = Entrana // 32 = Gnome Village // 33 = Goblin Village // 34 = HAM Base // 35 = Karamja // 36 = Lost & Found // 37 = Miscellania // 38 = Morton // 39 = Phasmatys // 40 = Port Sarim // 41 = Rimmington // 42 = Seers Village // 43 = Shilo Village // 44 = Taverly // 45 = Gnome Stronghold // 46 = Tzhaar // 47 = Varrock // 48 = Yanille // 49 = Castle Wars Game Area // 50 = Castle Wars Lobby // 51 = Castle Wars Underground // 52 = King Black Dragon Lair // 53 = Kalphite Lair

been released b4.

this is better to handle the songs externally. i just have no brain
